query:
ALTER TABLE student_points 
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS beltAnimationSeen BOOLEAN NOT NULL DEFAULT FALSE,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS lastBeltUpgrade TIMESTAMP NULL,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS pointsMultiplier DOUBLE NOT NULL DEFAULT 1.0,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS consecutivePerfectScores INT NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS totalExercisesCompleted INT NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS totalPerfectScores INT NOT NULL DEFAULT 0;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 4EmYiUJsZhACerp.0e9436e27250 --database c6FhCpifoFzEQqXNtsKEU6 --execute ALTER TABLE student_points 
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS beltAnimationSeen BOOLEAN NOT NULL DEFAULT FALSE,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS lastBeltUpgrade TIMESTAMP NULL,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS pointsMultiplier DOUBLE NOT NULL DEFAULT 1.0,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS consecutivePerfectScores INT NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS totalExercisesCompleted INT NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS totalPerfectScores INT NOT NULL DEFAULT 0;
